title: Browser Details
description: Detail information related to the browser

userAgent.title: User Agent
userAgent.description: The HTTP User-Agent string from the client request.

cookiesEnabled.title: Allows Cookies
cookiesEnabled.description: The current user agent settings allow for the writing of cookies.'

javaScriptEnabled.title: JavaScript Enabled
javaScriptEnabled.description: If JavaScript was enabled in the device this observation was made from.

javaScriptVersion.title: JavaScript Version
javaScriptVersion.description: The version of JavaScript supported during the observation.

javaEnabled.title: Java Enabled
javaEnabled.description: If Java was enabled in the device this observation was made from.

javaVersion.title: Java Version
javaVersion.description: The version of Java supported during the observation.

quicktimeVersion.title: Quicktime Version
quicktimeVersion.description: The version of Apple Quicktime supported during the observation.

thirdPartyCookiesEnabled.title: Allows Third-party Cookies
thirdPartyCookiesEnabled.description: If third-party cookies were enabled when this observation was made.

viewportHeight.title: Viewport Height
viewportHeight.description: The vertical size (in pixels) of the window the experience was displayed inside. For a web view event, the browser viewport height.

viewportWidth.title: Viewport Width
viewportWidth.description: The horizontal size (in pixels) of the window the experience was displayed inside. For a web view event, the browser viewport width.
